The Great Litany: To be said or sung, kneeling, standing, or in procession.
heading: rubric

The Great Litany: O God the Father, Creator of heaven and earth,
heading: leader

The Great Litany: Have mercy upon us.
heading: congregation

The Great Litany: O God the Son, Redeemer of the world,
heading: leader

The Great Litany: Have mercy upon us.
heading: congregation

The Great Litany: O God the Holy Ghost, Sanctifier of the faithful,
heading: leader

The Great Litany: Have mercy upon us.
heading: congregation

The Great Litany: O holy, blessed, and glorious Trinity, one God,
heading: leader

The Great Litany: Have mercy upon us.
heading: congregation

The Great Litany: Remember not, Lord, our offenses, nor the offenses of our forefathers; neither reward us according to our sins. Spare us, good Lord, spare thy people, whom thou hast redeemed with thy most precious blood, and by thy mercy preserve us for ever.
heading: leader

The Great Litany: Spare us, good Lord
heading: congregation

The Great Litany: From all evil and wickedness; from sin; from the crafts and assaults of the devil; from thy wrath, and from everlasting damnation,
heading: leader

The Great Litany: Good Lord, deliver us.
heading: congregation

The Great Litany: From all blindness of heart; from pride, vain-glory, and hypocrisy; from envy, hatred, and malice, and all want of charity,
heading: leader

The Great Litany: Good Lord, deliver us.
heading: congregation

The Great Litany: From all inordinate and sinful affections; and from all the deceits of the world, the flesh, and the devil,
heading: leader

The Great Litany: Good Lord, deliver us.
heading: congregation

The Great Litany: From all false doctrine, heresy, and schism; from hardness of heart, and contempt of thy Word and commandment,
heading: leader

The Great Litany: Good Lord, deliver us.
heading: congregation

The Great Litany: From lightning and tempest; from earthquake, fire, and flood; from plague, pestilence, and famine,
heading: leader

The Great Litany: Good Lord, deliver us.
heading: congregation

The Great Litany: From all oppression, conspiracy, and rebellion; from violence, battle, and murder; and from dying suddenly and unprepared,
heading: leader

The Great Litany: Good Lord, deliver us.
heading: congregation

The Great Litany: By the mystery of thy holy incarnation; by thy holy nativity and submission to the Law; by thy baptism, fasting, and temptation,
heading: leader

The Great Litany: Good Lord, deliver us.
heading: congregation

The Great Litany: By thy glorious resurrection and ascension; by the sending of the Holy Ghost; by thy heavenly intercession; and by thy coming again in power and great glory,
heading: leader

The Great Litany: Good Lord, deliver us.
heading: congregation

The Great Litany: In all time of our tribulation; in all time of our prosperity; in the hour of death, and in the day of judgment,
heading: leader

The Great Litany: Good Lord, deliver us.
heading: congregation

The Great Litany: We sinners do beseech thee to hear us, O Lord God: That it may please thee to rule and govern thy holy Church universal in the right way,
heading: leader

The Great Litany: We beseech thee to hear us, good Lord.
heading: congregation

The Great Litany: That it may please thee to illuminate all Bishops, Priests, and Deacons, with true knowledge and understanding of thy Word; and that, both by their preaching and living, they may set it forth, and show it accordingly,
heading: leader

The Great Litany: We beseech thee to hear us, good Lord.
heading: congregation

The Great Litany: That it may please thee to send forth laborers into thy harvest; to prosper their work by thy Holy Ghost; to make thy saving health known unto all nations; and to hasten the coming of thy kingdom,
heading: leader

The Great Litany: We beseech thee to hear us, good Lord.
heading: congregation

The Great Litany: That it may please thee to give to all thy people increase of grace to hear meekly thy Word, and to receive it with pure affection, and to bring forth the fruits of the Spirit,
heading: leader

The Great Litany: We beseech thee to hear us, good Lord.
heading: congregation

The Great Litany: That it may please thee to bring into the way of truth all such as have erred, and are deceived,
heading: leader

The Great Litany: We beseech thee to hear us, good Lord.
heading: congregation

The Great Litany: That it may please thee to give us a heart to love and fear thee, and diligently to live after thy commandments,
heading: leader

The Great Litany: We beseech thee to hear us, good Lord.
heading: congregation

The Great Litany: That it may please thee to bless and keep all thy people,
heading: leader

The Great Litany: We beseech thee to hear us, good Lord.
heading: congregation

The Great Litany: That it may please thee to rule the hearts of thy servant N., the President/Sovereign/Prime Minister, and all others in authority, that they may do justice, and show mercy, and walk humbly before thee,
heading: leader

The Great Litany: We beseech thee to hear us, good Lord.
heading: congregation

The Great Litany: That it may please thee to bless and keep all judges, giving them grace to execute justice, and to maintain truth,
heading: leader

The Great Litany: We beseech thee to hear us, good Lord.
heading: congregation

The Great Litany: That it may please thee to bless and keep our armed forces by sea, by land, and by air, and to shield them in all dangers and adversities,
heading: leader

The Great Litany: We beseech thee to hear us, good Lord.
heading: congregation

The Great Litany: That it may please thee to bless and protect all who serve their communities by their labor and learning,
heading: leader

The Great Litany: We beseech thee to hear us, good Lord.
heading: congregation

The Great Litany: That it may please thee to give and preserve to our use the kindly fruits of the earth, so that in due time we may enjoy them,
heading: leader

The Great Litany: We beseech thee to hear us, good Lord.
heading: congregation

The Great Litany: That it may please thee to make wars to cease in all the world; and to give to all nations unity, peace, and concord,
heading: leader

The Great Litany: We beseech thee to hear us, good Lord.
heading: congregation

The Great Litany: That it may please thee to show thy pity upon all prisoners and captives; refugees, the homeless, and the hungry; and all those who are desolate and oppressed,
heading: leader

The Great Litany: We beseech thee to hear us, good Lord.
heading: congregation

The Great Litany: That it may please thee to preserve all who are in danger by reason of their labor or travel,
heading: leader

The Great Litany: We beseech thee to hear us, good Lord.
heading: congregation

The Great Litany: That it may please thee to strengthen the bonds of those in Holy Matrimony; to uphold the widowed and abandoned; and to comfort all whose homes are torn by strife,
heading: leader

The Great Litany: We beseech thee to hear us, good Lord.
heading: congregation

The Great Litany: That it may please thee to protect the unborn and their parents, and to preserve all women in childbirth,
heading: leader

The Great Litany: We beseech thee to hear us, good Lord.
heading: congregation

The Great Litany: That it may please thee to care for those who have lost children or face infertility, and to provide for young children and orphans,
heading: leader

The Great Litany: We beseech thee to hear us, good Lord.
heading: congregation

The Great Litany: That it may please thee to visit the lonely and those who grieve; to strengthen all who suffer in mind, body, or spirit; and to comfort with thy presence those who are failing and infirm,
heading: leader

The Great Litany: We beseech thee to hear us, good Lord.
heading: congregation

The Great Litany: That it may please thee to succor, help, and comfort, all who are in danger, necessity, and tribulation,
heading: leader

The Great Litany: We beseech thee to hear us, good Lord.
heading: congregation

The Great Litany: That it may please thee to have mercy upon all mankind,
heading: leader

The Great Litany: We beseech thee to hear us, good Lord.
heading: congregation

The Great Litany: That it may please thee to give us true repentance; to forgive us all our sins, negligences, and ignorances; and to endue us with the grace of thy Holy Spirit to amend our lives according to thy holy Word,
heading: leader

The Great Litany: We beseech thee to hear us, good Lord.
heading: congregation

The Great Litany: That it may please thee to forgive our enemies, persecutors, and slanderers, and to turn their hearts,
heading: leader

The Great Litany: We beseech thee to hear us, good Lord.
heading: congregation

The Great Litany: That it may please thee to strengthen such as do stand; and to comfort and help the weak-hearted; and to raise up those who fall; and finally to beat down Satan under our feet,
heading: leader

The Great Litany: We beseech thee to hear us, good Lord.
heading: congregation

The Great Litany: That it may please thee to grant to all the faithful departed eternal life and peace,
heading: leader

The Great Litany: We beseech thee to hear us, good Lord.
heading: congregation

The Great Litany: That it may please thee to grant that, in the fellowship of [_____________ and] all the saints, we may attain unto thy heavenly kingdom,
heading: leader

The Great Litany: We beseech thee to hear us, good Lord.
heading: congregation

The Great Litany: Son of God, we beseech thee to hear us.
heading: leader

The Great Litany: Son of God, we beseech thee to hear us.
heading: congregation

The Great Litany: O Lamb of God, that takest away the sins of the world;
heading: leader

The Great Litany: Have mercy upon us.
heading: congregation

The Great Litany: O Lamb of God, that takest away the sins of the world;
heading: leader

The Great Litany: Have mercy upon us.
heading: congregation

The Great Litany: O Lamb of God, that takest away the sins of the world;
heading: leader

The Great Litany: Have mercy upon us.
heading: congregation

The Great Litany: O Christ, hear us.
heading: leader

The Great Litany: O Christ, hear us.
heading: congregation
